name: Vampire Peon
text: If this card is Special Summoned: You can pay 500 LP and declare a card type (Monster, Spell, Trap); each player sends 1 card of the declared type from their Deck to the GY. If this card is in your GY: You can send 1 "Vampire" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Vampire Peon" once per turn.
